price: (77) Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,[1052]
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: [1052]- The people worshipped idols in addition to Allāh.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
